CCing @jiangtaoli2016 FYI.

You can get this information from the [auth_context](
https://grpc.io/grpc/cpp/classgrpc_1_1_server_context.html#a2a8657d382cee53d670208d640383e8e)
[GetPeerIdentity](https://grpc.io/grpc/cpp/classgrpc_1_1_auth_context.html#a56a84468c1c3814a185cb6a2a3badf99) will give you the list of SANs or the CN if the SANs are not available. You can find the complete PEM cert by looking up the [PEM cert property `GRPC_X509_PEM_CERT_PROPERTY_NAME`](https://grpc.io/grpc/cpp/grpc__security__constants_8h.html#ad46c3fd565d6a24eeb25d1fdc342cb28) [by name](https://grpc.io/grpc/cpp/classgrpc_1_1_auth_context.html#ac32b53377f8b7e44328f791f44bd6732) on the auth context.
